entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Putting this on the backlog for now. We would be interesting in hearing from any others who hit this issue. #28231
  • register DbContext with AddPooledDbContextFactory with TContextService & TContextImplementation #28229
  • Allow AKs to exist in the model but avoid creating them in the database #28226
  • Version 6.0.6 Does not support 3.1 #28225
  • Type Error: Select null att Union select '6A009AF8-EB56-400F-8947-9084ABCC3FE7' att #28224
  • HiLo sequences are being dropped when specifying a default schema #28223
  • Cannot convert to nullable types when underlaying type is different in Indexer Properties #28222

Closed

  • Query: Provide a good story for calling into aggregate method call translator from QueryableMethodTranslator #28097
    7.0.0
  • Allow specifying different column names per table in TPT, TPC or entity splitting #19811
    7.0.0
  • dotnet ef migrations script does not group SQL statements #28202
  • EF Core connection performance with Managed Identity is slow #28161

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Resources.tt for VS2022 #28230
    auto-merge

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #28227
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.7
  • Query: Provide a way to translate aggregate methods on top level #28102
    auto-merge
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #28228
  • Add entity-splitting model building support #28156
  • [release/6.0] Query: Don't add grouping key to projection when Distinct is applied #28143
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • Json Columns initial work #28171
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #28178
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
